author: Cleo Abram
description:
How fast are you moving right now? 

You might think you’re standing still right now and relative to the earth, sure! 

But the earth is spinning at 1,600 km/hr at the equator… that’s faster than the speed of sound… 

And it’s more confusing than that because the earth is orbiting the Sun, which is ZOOMING through our galaxy… which is also moving… inside a universe that is expanding… 

For more optimistic science and tech stories, subscribe.

#shorts #universe #earth #sun #speed #science
title: How Fast Are You Moving?
